name: Rune Witch
description:
In a dangerous world of darkness and magic, use your necromancy to raise the dead and summon evil forces that bend to your will! Charge your runic altar to summon more and more powerful allies, and build your undead army before the witching hour is upon you!

(This game was creating for OrcaJam 2016.)

"I believe this is a game" - NGI 10/10
"The future of VR has arrived" - Pittsburgh VR Club
"It's on a platform that I don't use" - GamerPC 10/10
"I covered mid" - Chris Lefebvre 10/10
"Please let me sleep now" - Development Team 10/10
